chunks.text: Okay, we're going to make Palaiso today.
So we've got the jugs just boiled, so we've got boiling water in the jug, we've got oil,
we've got half a can of, half a cup of salt, some cream potato, some green food coloring,
and some flour.

So the way I like to do it is I actually like to make, put all the liquids into one bowl and then all the other ingredients into the other then mix it together. So we're going to start off with one cup of the flour.

two teaspoons of cream of tartar. I might do this one. One teaspoon, two teaspoon. Two
teaspoons. So two spoons of cream of tartar.
Now let's move that over here now.
And then this one I'm going to put in one cup of boiling water.

On it.
